summary: Website updates to support a Turkish version: add Turkish translations, provide a language dropdown under English, and show a Turkish PDF when Turkish is selected.

existing_features.title: Restrict the language picker UI to a dropdown that shows English as the default/primary selection and offers exactly two options: English and Turkish.

Implement Turkish translations for all user-facing text currently hardcoded in the UI (e.g., header title, newsletter titles/descriptions/status labels/buttons, PDF viewer controls) so that switching the language to Turkish renders Turkish text throughout the site.

Add support for language-specific PDF selection so that when Turkish is selected, the newsletter PDF opened in the viewer uses the attached Turkish PDF; when English is selected, it uses the existing English PDF.
Ensure the application UI and generated outputs do not add any assistant/AI credits or “built by” attribution text anywhere in the site (including footer and any modal/about areas).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Turkish translations for all site text and enable a Turkish version via the language system
Add a language button dropdown menu under English with English and Turkish options
Swap the English PDF to the attached Turkish PDF when the user selects Turkish
Do not display assistant/AI credits in the site or related outputs

projectName: Add Turkish site language with dropdown and Turkish PDF for newsletters
